alert.note: Alert for Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 5:13PM EDT until April 06 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Northeastern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Grady County in southwestern Georgia... Southwestern Thomas County in south central Georgia... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 513 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tallahassee, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monticello, Tallahassee, Florida A And M, Florida State University, Doak Campbell Stadium, Alma, Ralford Greenway, Macon Community Park, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Miccosukee, Iamonia, Drifton, Killearn Estates, Casa Blanco, Lake Ella, Tallahassee Mall, State Capital Complex, Governors Square Mall, Forest Meadows Park and Pisgah Church. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia.
